data.text: @PhineasZest @joeflech You're right, it also had a neon sign above it flashing, This is a bribe! What you didn't ask, and don't know why a 17 year old was able to walk into a judge's private chamber.
@crespogram @joeflech I assume the brown paper bag had giant $ sign on it and was labeled as "bribe"

@joeflech Nothing that happens in Miami's courts should ever be considered shocking. When I was 17 years old, I walked into a judge's chambers and caught him counting money from a brown paper bag. Never forgotten that, or all that I've witnessed in the years since about justice in Miami
